meanings.definition: relating to or characterized by eugenics
meanings.sent1: The eugenically modified plants grew faster than the others.
meanings.sent2: She had a eugenically perfect family according to the scientist.
meanings.sent3: The eugenically designed baby shower was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: His eugenically enhanced intelligence made him stand out in the class.
meanings.sent5: The eugenically bred puppies were all born with shiny coats.

meanings.definition: in a manner related to the science of improving the human race through controlled breeding
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the population eugenically to understand genetic patterns.
meanings.sent2: The couple decided to plan their family eugenically for a healthier future.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly said she would eugenically choose her future partner.
meanings.sent4: The idea of eugenically selecting leaders seemed both intriguing and concerning.
meanings.sent5: The society aimed to progress eugenically by promoting healthy habits.
